languages.text: "Ну-ну, {name}". {n}Голос Маражая полон искуственной жалости.{/n} "Возьми себя в руки. Хотя... сам сантимент не может меня не радовать. Пускай тебе еще и есть чему научиться". {n}Он бросает снисходительный взгляд на Чорду, после чего смотрит на вас с затаенной гордостью.{/n}

"There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну-ну, {name}". {n}Голос Маражая полон искуственной жалости.{/n} "Возьми себя в руки. Хотя... сам сантимент не может меня не радовать. Пускай тебе еще и есть чему научиться". {n}Он бросает снисходительный взгляд на Чорду, после чего смотрит на вас с затаенной гордостью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Get a grip. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not please me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “好了，好了，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋以故作怜悯的语气开了口。{/n}“克制一下吧，不过……这种感觉倒是让我挺开心的，虽说你还有很多东西要学。”{n}他居高临下地看了因森蒂娅一眼，随后带着压抑的自豪感，继续看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好了，好了，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋的声音里带着假装的怜悯。{/n}“别这么急，不过……这种感觉倒是让我挺开心的，虽然你还有很多东西要学。”{n}他居高临下地看了因森蒂娅一眼，随后带着压抑的自豪感，继续看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「まぁ、まぁ、{name}」{n}マラズハイの声には、見せかけばかりの同情の色がある。{/n}「しっかりしろ。とはいえ…嬉しくないと言っては嘘になる。まだ学ぶ事が沢山あるとしてもな」{n}彼はインセンディアに見下すかのような視線を送り、誇り抑え込んだ視線であなたを振り返った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まぁ、まぁ、{name}」{n}マラズハイの声には、見せかけばかりの同情の色がある。{/n}「しっかりしろ。とはいえ…嬉しくないと言っては嘘になる。まだ学ぶ事が沢山あるとしてもな」{n}彼はインセンディアに見下すかのような視線を送り、誇り抑え込んだ視線であなたを振り返った。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ahí, ahí, {name}». {n}La voz de Marazhai denota una lástima artificial.{/n} «Contrólese. Aunque... no puedo negar que me agrade pese a que le quede mucho por aprender». {n}Le dedica a Incendia una mira condescendiente y luego te devuelve la mirada con orgullo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ahí, ahí, {name}». {n}La voz de Marazhai denota una lástima artificial.{/n} «Contrólese. Aunque... no puedo negar que me agrade pese a que le quede mucho por aprender». {n}Le dedica a Incendia una mira condescendiente y luego te devuelve la mirada con orgullo.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Schon gut, {name}, schon gut." {n}Marazhais Stimme trieft vor gespieltem Mitleid.{/n} "Reißt Euch zusammen. Dennoch ... Ich kann nicht behaupten, dass mich der Gedanke nicht entzückt. Auch wenn Ihr noch viel zu lernen habt." {n}Er bedenkt Incendia mit einem herablassenden Blick und sieht dann mit unterdrücktem Stolz wieder zu dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Schon gut, {name}, schon gut. {n}Marazhais Stimme trieft vor gespieltem Mitleid.{/n} "Reißt Euch zusammen. Dennoch ... Ich kann nicht behaupten, dass mich der Gedanke nicht erfreut. Auch wenn Ihr noch viel zu lernen habt." {n}Er bedenkt Incendia mit einem herablassenden Blick und sieht dann mit unterdrücktem Stolz wieder zu dir.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ça va aller, {name}, {n}dit-il d'une voix dégoulinante de fausse compassion.{/n} Reprenez-vous. Néanmoins... je ne peux pas dire que ça ne m'ait pas plu, même s'il vous reste beaucoup à apprendre. » {n}Il lance à Incendia un regard condescendant, puis vous regarde à nouveau avec une fierté réprimée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça va aller, {name}, {n}dit-il d'une voix dégoulinante de fausse compassion.{/n} Reprenez-vous. Néanmoins... je ne peux pas dire que ça ne m'ait pas plu, même s'il vous reste beaucoup à apprendre. » {n}Il lance à Incendia un regard condescendant, puis vous regarde à nouveau avec une fierté réprimée.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tamam {name}, tamam." {n}Marazhai'ın sesinden sahte bir acıma fışkırıyor.{/n} "Sakin ol. Her ne kadar daha öğrenecek çok şeyin olsa da bu teşebbüsünün beni mutlu etmediğini söyleyemem." {n}İncendia'ya küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından bastırılmış bir gururla gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There, there, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice is dripping with feigned pity.{/n} "Control yourself. Nevertheless... I cannot say the sentiment does not delight me. Even if you still have much to learn." {n}He graces Incendia with a condescending glance, then looks back at you with repressed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tamam {name}, tamam." {n}Marazhai'ın sesinden sahte bir acıma fışkırıyor.{/n} "Kendini kontrol et. Buna teşebbüs etmiş olmanın beni mutlu etmediğini de söyleyemem ayrıca. Her ne kadar daha öğrenecek çok şeyin olsa da." {n}İncendia'ya küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından bastırılmış bir gururla gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
